doc:
Dick Fair https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dick_Fair 0 Dick Fair (born as Richard Edward Fair in 1907 in Mosman, New South Wales – 1982) was an Australian actor and radio compere, best known for hosting the enormously-popular radio shows 'Australia's Amateur Hour' and 'Australia's Hour of Song'. He occasionally acted under the name Grant Lyndsay. Dick_Fair ( born as Richard_Edward_Fair in 1907 in Mosman , New_South_Wales – 1982 ) was an_Australian_actor_and_radio_compere , best_known for hosting the_enormously-popular_radio shows ' Australia 's_Amateur_Hour ' and ' Australia 's_Hour of Song ' . He occasionally acted under the_name_Grant_Lyndsay .
